Articles.Content:
Hey all, I saw a mod about a year ago that has a retractable ducted fan for a blimp, and I cant seem to find it again.  Retractable ducted fans are good for a blimp probe or space ship to another planet with an atmosphere because itll protect it on entry. Does anyone know which mod this is and where I can find it?  I think it was just the part in the mod.  Even if it was never completed I may be able to finish it myself

Its radially mounted, and it folds in, it rotates 90 degrees back into an indentation in the base so it sits against the side of the ship flat, its streamlined.  I definately remember seeing the model so I know that part was finished.  Its brilliant but I cant seem to find it again

Edited September 11, 2017 by At4851
adding extra info
